channel.title: How to make
channel.description:
I am looking for a couple guide on how to find then take the rs cache from eoc and make a private server for me and some freinds to play on please and thank you
(if at all possible also how to make it spawnable)

item.title: How to make
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

We’re not going to spoonfeed you.

You want to do it yourself? Here’s how you do it.

First, if you don’t have a private server already, download one, or make one from scratch.
Second, if you’re not using a on-par server base (ie. Using a 317 server with 508+ content) then you’ll need to modify how the data is read/written to the cache, and rendered by the client.

Assuming you have those two, you then need to:
Third, decompile and deobfuscate the current client, (or add your own updater to log all file access during a normal play through) in order to determine how it is currently being read and rendered
If you’re using a previous server protocol (317, 508, etc) you then need to adjust how the packets are sent to/from the server (the types of obfuscation used) in order to make any use of the content.

That is how you make an EoC enabled server. Have fun!

Read full topic
